title: Neopyter
$comment: This schema is work with neoconf.nvim
description: A Neovim plugin. Integrate JupyterLab and Neovim

mode.title: Neopyter mode
mode.description: Different work mode determine different methods of communication. The `proxy` mode will communicate through jupyter server, while the `direct` mode will communicate directly with nvim

remote_address.title: Remote address
remote_address.description: For `direct` mode, the address neovim listen to; for `proxy` mode, the address neovim connect to
